Question
========

Two nurses (vpk1 and vpk2) measure in 41 patients right after each other's heart rates. The results are shown in the attached scatterplot. The lowest of the 80 measured heart rate values equals:

![](uva-range-1218-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 46
* 50
* 52
* 54

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 46: Correct
* 50: Incorrect
* 52: Incorrect
* 54: Incorrect
